Documents.CountSql: SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM auteurs a LEFT JOIN auteurs_alias aa ON a.id=aa.id_auteur;
Documents.DataSql: SELECT a.id AS m_targetid,a.nom AS aunam,a.remarque AS aunot,aa.nom AS aanam FROM auteurs a LEFT JOIN auteurs_alias aa ON a.id=aa.id_auteur ORDER BY a.id LIMIT {1} OFFSET {0};

Documents.CountSql: SELECT COUNT(w.id) FROM oeuvres w LEFT JOIN oeuvres_alias ws ON ws.id_oeuvre=w.id;
Documents.DataSql: SELECT w.id AS m_targetid,w.titre AS wkttl,ws.titre AS wattl,w.titulus AS wktit,w.incipit AS wkinc,w.desinit AS wkdes,w.lieu AS wkplc,w.remarque AS wknot FROM oeuvres w LEFT JOIN oeuvres_alias ws ON ws.id_oeuvre=w.id ORDER BY w.id LIMIT {1} OFFSET {0};

Documents.CountSql: SELECT COUNT(auteurs.id) FROM auteurs INNER JOIN zotero ON auteurs.id=zotero.targetId WHERE zotero.authorTarget=1;
Documents.DataSql: SELECT auteurs.id AS m_targetid,zotero.authors AS zaaut,zotero.title AS zattl,zotero.abstract AS zaabs FROM auteurs INNER JOIN zotero ON auteurs.id=zotero.targetId WHERE zotero.authorTarget=1 ORDER BY auteurs.id LIMIT {1} OFFSET {0};

Documents.CountSql: SELECT COUNT(oeuvres.id) FROM oeuvres INNER JOIN zotero ON oeuvres.id=zotero.targetId WHERE zotero.authorTarget=0;
Documents.DataSql: SELECT oeuvres.id AS m_targetid,zotero.authors AS zaaut,zotero.title AS zattl,zotero.abstract AS zaabs FROM auteurs INNER JOIN zotero ON oeuvres.id=zotero.targetId WHERE zotero.authorTarget=0 ORDER BY oeuvres.id LIMIT {1} OFFSET {0};
